introduction: SYNOPSISFaithful family man Yun Kyung-ho works in management at a large company. Kyung-ho is having a drink with his friend when he meets the beautiful hostess, Hye-ri. Falling into a love affair, Kyung-ho starts living with Hye-ri. Du-sam, Hye-ri's ex-boyfriend, shows up and demands a large amount of money. Du-sam tells Kyung-ho's wife about the affair. Kyung-ho attacks Du-sam and is put in jail. Time passes and Kyung-ho is released from jail. He resumes living with Hye-ri but the violent tendencies of Du-sam, now a cripple, haven't changed. One day, Du-sam forces himself on Hye-ri when she kills him and is arrested. Kyung-ho's chronic desease is getting worse. Kyung-ho's daughter, Mi-na, who is now in junior high, is having a piano recital. Kyung-ho is working as a janitor in the music hall. Mi-na and Kyung-ho have a dramatic meeting. In the hospital for his chronic illness, Kyung-ho atones to his family.故事一家大型公司执行人员的忠实领导人尹庆和与朋友一起喝酒，会见了一位美丽的女主人Hieri。她生活在一个马槽里，住在一起，两个老儿子Hye Ri出现，要求一大笔钱。当两名男子暴露于妻子时，警卫殴打他并被监禁。过了一段时间，他又开始和惠利一起生活，但他仍然是两人的失败者。有一天，斗山被暗杀的Hye Ri被捕和杀害。成为监护人并成为中学生的守卫的女儿米娜（Mina）成为一名钢琴演奏家，与一名成为演奏厅清洁工的守卫大大的会面。一名长期患病的医护人员为家人赎罪。
